WHAT SHOULD I PAY ATTENTION TO BEFORE USING?
1. When baking, it's better to put the mould in the flat baking tray as the silicone mould is soft.

2. When baking, be sure to place it in the middle of the oven and keep a distance of 5-10cm from the heating tube. Do not directly touch the four walls of the oven to prevent damage to the mould due to the high temperature.
3. Apply a thin layer of butter to the surface before the first use for baking.
3. Please add some water to the empty mould without filling material because empty baking will shorten the life of the silicone mould.
HOW TO CLEAN THE PRODUCTS?
1.You can use the normal cleaning method of kitchenware, and you can directly put it in the dishwasher for cleaning.
2.Remember not to use cleaning equipment with a rough surface to avoid scratches on the mould.
3.After cleaning, ventilate the place to dry quickly.
4.When not in use for a long time, do not directly expose to air.
